section.heading: Prohibition against certain public employment and political activities

content.p:
ยง 27. Prohibition against certain public employment and political
activities. 1. A member of a municipal civil service commission or
personnel officer, appointed on or after the effective date of this act,
shall not hold any other public office or employment under the political
subdivisions or subdivision over which such commission or personnel
officer exercises jurisdiction, for which he shall receive compensation
other than necessary travel and other expenses incurred in the
performance of the duties of such office or employment.
 2. A member of a municipal civil service commission or personnel
officer shall not serve as an officer of any political party.
